languages.text: "Ты превратил мирное поселение в кровавое месиво. Какие еще нужны доказательства?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты превратил мирное поселение в кровавое месиво. Какие еще нужны доказательста?"

languages.text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"
languages.original_text: "Ты превратил мирное поселение в кровавое месиво. Какие еще нужны доказательства?"

traits.locale_text: "You have turned a peaceful settlement into a bloody mash. What other evidence does one need?"
"You have turned a peaceful settlement into a bloody mash. What other evidence does one need?"
"You have turned a peaceful settlement into a bloody mash. What other evidence does one need?"
"You have turned a peaceful settlement into a bloody mash. What other evidence does one need?"
"You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"
"You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

languages.text: «Ha reducido un asentamiento tranquilo a una matanza sangrienta. ¿Qué más pruebas se necesitan?».
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha reducido un asentamiento pacífico a una pulpa sanguinolenta. ¿Qué más pruebas se necesitan?».

languages.text: “你把一座宁静的村庄变成了血腥的屠宰场，还需要别的证据吗？”
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

traits.locale_text: “你把一座平和的村庄变成了血腥的屠宰场，还需要别的证据吗？”

languages.text: « Vous venez de transformer un village paisible en scène de carnage. Me faut-il plus de preuves ? »
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous venez de transformer un village paisible en scène de carnage. Me faut-il plus de preuves ? »

languages.text: 「お前は平和な和解の地を血の海に変えた。他にどんな証拠が必要だ？」
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は平和な和解の地を血の海に変えた。他にどんな証拠が必要だ？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt eine friedliche Siedlung in ein blutiges Schlachtfeld verwandelt. Welche anderen Beweise braucht man noch?"
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt eine friedliche Siedlung in blutigen Brei verwandelt. Welche anderen Beweise braucht man noch?"

languages.text: "Huzurlu bir yerleşim yerini katliamla kana buladın. Başka ne tür bir kanıta gerek var ki?"
languages.original_text: "You have turned a calm settlement into bloody carnage. What other evidence does one need?"
